handleStream.rewardsCreated: Channel rewards have been created successfully. Keep this window open during your stream to avoid connection failures.
handleStream.streamerHasAnOpenStream: We noticed you have an open stream with active rewards. The stream will be terminated and new channel rewards will be created for the new stream.
handleStream.rewardsCantBeRemoved: Existing XQ and/or Qoins rewards could not be removed, contact technical support.
handleStream.closeStreamConfirmation: Are you sure you want to end the stream? If you do, the stream will be no longer available. The remaining Qapla rewards will get distributed to your audience immediately.
handleStream.rewardsSent: Rewards sent! We‚Äôve sent the remaining rewards to your audience successfully, and the channel rewards have been deleted :)
handleStream.streamClosed: This stream has ended, it‚Äôs no longer available.

cheersBalanceTooltip.description: Your community can send you Qoins for free directly from the Qapla app. We send you your Qoins as Bits directly to your Twitch channel at the end of each period.

confirmDialog.confirmDetails: Just confirm the details to continue

CheersSettings.title: Receive messages from your community
CheersSettings.description: Show the messages of the cheers that your community sends you in your streams by adding this link into your OBS.

instruction0.title: How do I add Qapla cheer alerts to my OBS?
instruction0.description: It is too easy! It works just like the alerts you already know and you like to show so much in your streams :).
instruction0.descriptionBold: Follow the simple instructions below to add them.

instruction1.title: 1. Open your OBS setup
instruction1.description: Go to your OBS (StreamLabs, OBS, Stream Elements, etc.) and open the setup that you use regularly to stream.

instruction2.title: 2. Add a source to your screen in your OBS

instruction3.title: 3. Select Browser Source from the sources menu

instruction5.title: 5. Copy paste your custom Qapla URL.
instruction5.description: Go to Source > Options. Define width to 400 and height to 200. Uncheck all other options

instruction6.title: 6. Test your Qapla cheer alerts
instruction6.description: Press the button to send a fake message in order to check if everything is working

CheersSettings.testCheerError: There was an error sending the test message, try again, if the error persists contact technical support
CheersSettings.testCheerSuccess: Test Cheer sent succesfuly! It will be shown in your OBS in a few seconds
